SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'U' + CAST(CMS_User.UserID AS nvarchar(50)) AS OperatorID, FullName + ' (' + CMS_User.UserName + ')' AS OperatorName, CMS_User.UserIsHidden AS Hidden, NULL AS GroupID, NULL AS RoleName FROM CMS_User, CMS_UserSite WHERE (CMS_User.UserName LIKE @Search OR CMS_User.FullName LIKE @Search) AND (CMS_User.UserID = CMS_UserSite.UserID AND CMS_UserSite.SiteID=@SiteID) UNION SELECT 'R' + CAST(RoleID AS nvarchar(50)) AS OperatorID, RoleDisplayName AS OperatorName, 0 AS Hidden, RoleGroupID AS GroupID, RoleName AS RoleName FROM CMS_Role WHERE RoleDisplayName LIKE @Search AND SiteID = @SiteID) AS Operators WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY OperatorName

SELECT ##TOPN## Matrix.##COLUMNS##, CASE WHEN CMS_RolePermission.RoleID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS Allowed FROM (SELECT CMS_Permission.PermissionID, CMS_Permission.PermissionOrder, CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayName, CMS_Permission.PermissionName, CMS_Permission.ClassID, CMS_Permission.ResourceID,CMS_Permission.PermissionDescription, CMS_Role.RoleID, CMS_Role.Rolename, CMS_Role.RoleDisplayName FROM CMS_Permission, CMS_Role WHERE (CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayInMatrix = @DisplayInMatrix OR ((@DisplayInMatrix=1) AND (CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayInMatrix IS NULL))) AND ResourceID = @ID AND RoleID IN (SELECT RoleID FROM CMS_Role WHERE ##WHERE## AND (SiteID IS NULL)) ) Matrix LEFT JOIN CMS_RolePermission ON (Matrix.PermissionID = CMS_RolePermission.PermissionID AND CMS_RolePermission.RoleID = Matrix.RoleID) ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

SELECT ##TOPN## Matrix.##COLUMNS##, CASE WHEN CMS_RolePermission.RoleID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS Allowed FROM (SELECT CMS_Permission.PermissionID, CMS_Permission.PermissionOrder, CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayName, CMS_Permission.PermissionName, CMS_Permission.ClassID, CMS_Permission.ResourceID,CMS_Permission.PermissionDescription, CMS_Role.RoleID, CMS_Role.Rolename, CMS_Role.RoleDisplayName FROM CMS_Permission, CMS_Role WHERE (CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayInMatrix = @DisplayInMatrix OR ((@DisplayInMatrix=1) AND (CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayInMatrix IS NULL))) AND ResourceID = @ID AND RoleID IN (SELECT RoleID FROM CMS_Role WHERE ##WHERE## AND ((@SiteID = 0 AND SiteID is NULL) OR SiteID = @SiteID)) ) Matrix LEFT JOIN CMS_RolePermission ON (Matrix.PermissionID = CMS_RolePermission.PermissionID AND CMS_RolePermission.RoleID = Matrix.RoleID) ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

DELETE FROM CMS_ObjectVersionHistory WHERE VersionModifiedWhen < (SELECT MIN(VersionModifiedWhen) FROM (SELECT ##TOPN## VersionModifiedWhen FROM CMS_ObjectVersionHistory WHERE VersionObjectType LIKE @ObjectType AND VersionObjectID = @ObjectID AND VersionNumber LIKE N'%.0' ORDER BY VersionModifiedWhen DESC) sub) AND VersionObjectType LIKE @ObjectType AND VersionObjectID = @ObjectID

DELETE FROM CMS_ObjectVersionHistory WHERE VersionModifiedWhen < (SELECT MIN(VersionModifiedWhen) FROM (SELECT ##TOPN## VersionModifiedWhen FROM CMS_ObjectVersionHistory WHERE VersionObjectType LIKE @ObjectType AND VersionObjectID = @ObjectID AND VersionNumber NOT LIKE N'%.0' ORDER BY VersionModifiedWhen DESC) sub) AND VersionObjectType LIKE @ObjectType AND VersionObjectID = @ObjectID AND VersionNumber NOT LIKE N'%.0'

SELECT COM_OrderItemSKUFile.*, COM_SKUFile.FileName, COM_SKUFile.FilePath, COM_OrderItem.OrderItemSKUName, COM_OrderItem.OrderItemValidTo, COM_Order.OrderSiteID FROM COM_OrderItemSKUFile JOIN COM_SKUFile ON COM_SKUFile.FileID = COM_OrderItemSKUFile.FileID JOIN COM_OrderItem ON COM_OrderItem.OrderItemID = COM_OrderItemSKUFile.OrderItemID JOIN COM_Order ON COM_Order.OrderID = COM_OrderItem.OrderItemOrderID WHERE (##WHERE##) ORDER BY (##ORDERBY##)

SELECT COM_OrderItem.*, COM_OrderItemSKUFile.Token, COM_SKUFile.FileName, COM_SKU.SKUProductType, COM_Order.OrderSiteID, COM_Customer.CustomerID, COM_Customer.CustomerEmail FROM COM_OrderItem JOIN COM_OrderItemSKUFile ON COM_OrderItemSKUFile.OrderItemID = COM_OrderItem.OrderItemID JOIN COM_SKUFile ON COM_SKUFile.FileID = COM_OrderItemSKUFile.FileID JOIN COM_SKU ON COM_SKU.SKUID = COM_OrderItem.OrderItemSKUID JOIN COM_Order ON COM_Order.OrderID = COM_OrderItem.OrderItemOrderID JOIN COM_Customer ON COM_Customer.CustomerID = COM_Order.OrderCustomerID WHERE ((DATEDIFF(day, GETDATE(), COM_OrderItem.OrderItemValidTo) BETWEEN 0 AND @Days) AND ((@OnlyWithSendNotification = 0) OR (COM_OrderItem.OrderItemSendNotification = 1)) AND ((@SiteID = 0) OR (COM_Order.OrderSiteID = @SiteID)) AND (##WHERE##)) ORDER BY (##ORDERBY##)

SELECT CMS_MembershipUser.*, CMS_Membership.MembershipDisplayName, CMS_Membership.MembershipSiteID, CMS_User.Email FROM CMS_MembershipUser JOIN CMS_Membership ON CMS_Membership.MembershipID = CMS_MembershipUser.MembershipID JOIN CMS_User ON CMS_User.UserID = CMS_MembershipUser.UserID WHERE ((DATEDIFF(day, GETDATE(), CMS_MembershipUser.ValidTo) BETWEEN 0 AND @Days) AND (ISNULL(CMS_Membership.MembershipSiteID, 0) = @SiteID) AND ((@OnlyWithSendNotification = 0) OR (CMS_MembershipUser.SendNotification = 1)) AND (##WHERE##)) ORDER BY (##ORDERBY##)

--DECLARE @RoomID Int = 223
SELECT [CRU_OUTER].ChatRoomUserAdminLevel, [CU].*, (CASE WHEN [CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserJoinTime] IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS [IsOnline], (CASE WHEN [CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserLastModification] > [CU].[ChatUserLastModification] THEN [CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserLastModification] ELSE [CU].[ChatUserLastModification] END) AS [LastChange] FROM ( SELECT [CRU].*, (CASE WHEN [CR].[ChatRoomPrivate] = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) AS [raisedPrivilegiesValue] -- Value of admin level considered as raised privilegies in this room (Join in private and Admin in public rooms) FROM [Chat_RoomUser] AS [CRU] INNER JOIN [Chat_Room] AS [CR] ON [CR].[ChatRoomID] = [CRU].[ChatRoomUserRoomID] ) AS [CRU_OUTER] INNER JOIN [Chat_User] AS [CU] ON [CU].[ChatUserID] = [CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserChatUserID] WHERE [CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserRoomID] = @RoomID AND -- Filter to specified room ([CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserJoinTime] IS NOT NULL OR -- Get online users ([CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserAdminLevel] >= [CRU_OUTER].[raisedPrivilegiesValue] AND -- Or users who has raised privilegies ([CU].[ChatUserUserID] IS NOT NULL OR -- But are non anonymous EXISTS(SELECT [COU].ChatOnlineUserID FROM [Chat_OnlineUser] AS [COU] WHERE [COU].[ChatOnlineUserChatUserID] = [CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserChatUserID] AND [COU].[ChatOnlineUserJoinTime] IS NOT NULL ) -- Or online (on whatever site) anonymous ) ) )

-- DECLARE @SiteID INT -- SET @SiteID = 4
SELECT RoomID, OnlineUsersCount, CASE WHEN MaxJoinTime > MaxLeaveTime THEN MaxJoinTime ELSE ISNULL(MaxLeaveTime, MaxJoinTime) END AS LastChange FROM ( SELECT CRU.ChatRoomUserRoomID AS RoomID, (SELECT COUNT(CRU2.ChatRoomUserID) FROM Chat_RoomUser AS CRU2 WHERE CRU2.ChatRoomUserRoomID = CRU.ChatRoomUserRoomID AND CRU2.ChatRoomUserJoinTime IS NOT NULL ) AS OnlineUsersCount, MAX(ChatRoomUserJoinTime) AS MaxJoinTime, MAX(ChatRoomUserLeaveTime) AS MaxLeaveTime FROM Chat_RoomUser AS CRU LEFT JOIN Chat_Room AS CR ON CRU.ChatRoomUserRoomID = CR.ChatRoomID WHERE CR.ChatRoomSiteID IS NULL OR CR.ChatRoomSiteID = @SiteID GROUP BY CRU.ChatRoomUserRoomID ) AS t1

--DECLARE @ChatUserID INT --SET @ChatUserID = 398
SELECT CRU.ChatRoomUserRoomID FROM Chat_RoomUser CRU WHERE CRU.ChatRoomUserChatUserID = @ChatUserID AND CRU.ChatRoomUserJoinTime IS NOT NULL

--DECLARE @RoomID INT --SET @RoomID = 218 --DECLARE @CurrentChatUserID INT --SET @CurrentChatUserID = 399
SELECT CRU.* FROM Chat_RoomUser CRU WHERE CRU.ChatRoomUserRoomID = @RoomID AND CRU.ChatRoomUserChatUserID <> @CurrentChatUserID

--DECLARE @ChatUserID INT --SET @ChatUserID = 406
SELECT CRU.ChatRoomUserRoomID AS RoomID, CRU.ChatRoomUserAdminLevel AS AdminLevel, CRU.ChatRoomUserLastModification AS LastChange, CR.ChatRoomIsOneToOne FROM Chat_Room AS CR RIGHT JOIN Chat_RoomUser AS CRU ON CRU.ChatRoomUserRoomID = CR.ChatRoomID WHERE CRU.ChatRoomUserChatUserID = @ChatUserID

--DECLARE @ChangedSince DateTime = '2012-01-01 14:37:39.649' --DECLARE @RoomID Int = 690
SELECT [CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserAdminLevel], [CU].[ChatUserID], [CU].[ChatUserUserID], [CU].[ChatUserNickname], [CU].[ChatUserLastModification], (CASE WHEN [CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserJoinTime] IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS [IsOnline], (CASE WHEN [CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserLastModification] > [CU].[ChatUserLastModification] THEN [CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserLastModification] ELSE [CU].[ChatUserLastModification] END) AS [LastChange], (CASE WHEN [CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserJoinTime] IS NOT NULL THEN 0 -- User is online -> NOT REMOVE WHEN [CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserAdminLevel] < [CRU_OUTER].[raisedPrivilegiesValue] THEN 1 -- User's privilegies are not considered as raised -> REMOVE WHEN [CU].[ChatUserUserID] IS NOT NULL THEN 0 -- User is non anonymous -> NOT REMOVE WHEN EXISTS( SELECT [COU].ChatOnlineUserID FROM [Chat_OnlineUser] AS [COU] WHERE ([COU].[ChatOnlineUserChatUserID] = [CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserChatUserID]) AND ([COU].[ChatOnlineUserJoinTime] IS NOT NULL) ) THEN 0 -- User is online in a chat -> NOT REMOVE ELSE 1 -- Else -> REMOVE END) AS [IsRemoved] FROM ( SELECT [CRU].*, (CASE WHEN [CR].[ChatRoomPrivate] = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) AS [raisedPrivilegiesValue] -- Value of admin level considered as raised privilegies in this room (Join in private and Admin in public rooms) FROM [Chat_RoomUser] AS [CRU] INNER JOIN [Chat_Room] AS [CR] ON [CR].[ChatRoomID] = [CRU].[ChatRoomUserRoomID] ) AS [CRU_OUTER] INNER JOIN [Chat_User] AS [CU] ON [CU].[ChatUserID] = [CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserChatUserID] WHERE ([CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserRoomID] = @RoomID) AND -- Filter only to specified room (([CRU_OUTER].[ChatRoomUserLastModification] > @ChangedSince) OR ([CU].[ChatUserLastModification] > @ChangedSince)) -- Filter to changed rows only
--DECLARE @RoomID INT --SET @RoomID = 223 --DECLARE @ChangedSince DATETIME --SET @ChangedSince = dateadd(d,-1,GETDATE())

--DECLARE @ChangedSince DATETIME = DATEADD(DAY, -2, GETDATE()) --DECLARE @ByUser BIT = 1
SELECT UserContactID, RoomID, InitiatorName, RequestState, CASE WHEN RequestState = 1 AND MessagesLastModification > RequestLastModification THEN MessagesLastModification ELSE RequestLastModification END AS LastChange -- If request is not New (RequestState is not 1), always select RequestLastModification. Otherwise select bigger time. FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN @ByUser = 1 THEN CICR.InitiatedChatRequestUserID ELSE CICR.InitiatedChatRequestContactID END AS UserContactID, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestRoomID AS RoomID, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorName AS InitiatorName, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestState AS RequestState, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestLastModification AS RequestLastModification, MAX(CM.ChatMessageLastModified) AS MessagesLastModification FROM [Chat_InitiatedChatRequest] AS CICR LEFT JOIN [Chat_Message] AS CM ON CICR.InitiatedChatRequestRoomID = CM.ChatMessageRoomID WHERE CM.ChatMessageSystemMessageType = 0 AND (@ByUser = 1 AND CICR.InitiatedChatRequestUserID IS NOT NULL) OR (@ByUser = 0 AND CICR.InitiatedChatRequestContactID IS NOT NULL) GROUP BY CICR.InitiatedChatRequestRoomID, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestUserID, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestContactID, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorName, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestState, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestLastModification ) AS TInner WHERE MessagesLastModification > @ChangedSince OR RequestLastModification > @ChangedSince

--DECLARE @ByUser BIT = 0
SELECT UserContactID, RoomID, InitiatorName, RequestState, CASE WHEN RequestState = 1 AND MessagesLastModification > RequestLastModification THEN MessagesLastModification ELSE RequestLastModification END AS LastChange -- If request is not New (RequestState is not 1), always select RequestLastModification. Otherwise select bigger time. FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN @ByUser = 1 THEN CICR.InitiatedChatRequestUserID ELSE CICR.InitiatedChatRequestContactID END AS UserContactID, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestRoomID AS RoomID, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorName AS InitiatorName, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestState AS RequestState, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestLastModification AS RequestLastModification, MAX(CM.ChatMessageLastModified) AS MessagesLastModification FROM [Chat_InitiatedChatRequest] AS CICR LEFT JOIN [Chat_Message] AS CM ON CICR.InitiatedChatRequestRoomID = CM.ChatMessageRoomID WHERE CM.ChatMessageSystemMessageType = 0 AND (@ByUser = 1 AND CICR.InitiatedChatRequestUserID IS NOT NULL) OR (@ByUser = 0 AND CICR.InitiatedChatRequestContactID IS NOT NULL) GROUP BY CICR.InitiatedChatRequestRoomID, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestUserID, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestContactID, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorName, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestState, CICR.InitiatedChatRequestLastModification ) AS TInner

SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS##
FROM ( SELECT QueryID, QueryName, QueryTypeID, QueryText, QueryRequiresTransaction, ClassID, QueryIsLocked, QueryLastModified, QueryGUID, QueryLoadGeneration, QueryIsCustom, QueryConnectionString
FROM dbo.CMS_Query WHERE ClassID IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT 0 AS QueryID, 'selectall' AS QueryName, 0 AS QueryTypeID, 'SELECT NULL' AS QueryText, 0 AS QueryRequiresTransaction, c.ClassID AS ClassID, 0 AS QueryIsLocked, GETDATE() AS QueryLastModified, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' AS QueryGUID, 0 AS QueryLoadGeneration, 0 AS QueryIsCustom, c.ClassConnectionString AS QueryConnectionString
FROM CMS_Class c
WHERE c.ClassID NOT IN (SELECT ClassID FROM CMS_Query WHERE QueryName = 'selectall' AND ClassID IS NOT NULL) ) t
WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

--DECLARE @ModifiedSince DATETIME --SET @ModifiedSince = NULL --DECLARE @TopN INT --SET @TopN = 1000 --DECLARE @RoomID INT --SET @RoomID = 431
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TOP (COALESCE(@TopN,3000)) CM.ChatMessageID AS MessageID, CM.ChatMessageText AS MessageText, CU.ChatUserNickname AS Nickname, CURecipient.ChatUserNickname AS Recipient, CM.ChatMessageCreatedWhen AS CreatedWhen, CM.ChatMessageLastModified AS MessageLastModified, CM.ChatMessageSystemMessageType AS SystemMessageType, CM.ChatMessageRejected AS IsRejected, CM.ChatMessageRecipientID AS RecipientID, CM.ChatMessageUserID AS AuthorID FROM Chat_Message AS CM LEFT JOIN Chat_User AS CU ON CM.ChatMessageUserID = CU.ChatUserID LEFT JOIN Chat_User AS CURecipient ON CM.ChatMessageRecipientID = CURecipient.ChatUserID WHERE CM.ChatMessageRoomID = @RoomID -- select messages which belong to this room AND (@ModifiedSince IS NULL OR ChatMessageLastModified > @ModifiedSince) AND ##WHERE## ORDER BY CM.ChatMessageLastModified DESC ) AS t1 ORDER BY t1.CreatedWhen

SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM (SELECT *, ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactLastName, '') AS ContactFullNameJoined, ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactAddress1,'') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactAddress1,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ', ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactAddress2,'') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactAddress2,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ', ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactCity, '') AS ContactFullAddressJoined FROM OM_Contact) as OM_Contact WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM ( SELECT OM_Contact.*, OM_Membership.*, ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactLastName, '') AS ContactFullNameJoined, ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactAddress1, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactAddress1,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactAddress2,'') AS ContactFullAddressJoined FROM OM_Contact INNER JOIN OM_Membership ON OM_Membership.ActiveContactID=OM_Contact.ContactID ) as tab WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM ( SELECT ContactID, MembershipID, ActiveContactID, OriginalContactID,ContactMergedWithContactID, RelatedID, OM_Contact.ContactSiteID, ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactLastName, '') AS ContactFullNameJoined FROM OM_Membership INNER JOIN OM_Contact ON OM_Membership.OriginalContactID=OM_Contact.ContactID WHERE ContactID IN (SELECT * FROM Func_OM_Contact_GetChildren(@ContactID,1)) AND MemberType=0 ) as tab WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM ( SELECT ContactID, MembershipID, ActiveContactID, OriginalContactID, RelatedID, ContactMergedWithContactID, OM_Contact.ContactSiteID, ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactLastName, '') AS ContactFullNameJoined FROM OM_Membership INNER JOIN OM_Contact ON OM_Membership.OriginalContactID=OM_Contact.ContactID WHERE ActiveContactID=@ContactID AND MemberType=1) as tab WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM ( SELECT ContactID, MembershipID, ActiveContactID, OriginalContactID, ContactMergedWithContactID, RelatedID, OM_Contact.ContactSiteID, ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactLastName, '') AS ContactFullNameJoined FROM OM_Membership INNER JOIN OM_Contact ON OM_Membership.OriginalContactID=OM_Contact.ContactID WHERE ActiveContactID=@ContactID AND MemberType=0 ) as tab WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM ( SELECT ContactID, MembershipID, ActiveContactID, OriginalContactID, RelatedID, ContactMergedWithContactID, OM_Contact.ContactSiteID, ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactLastName, '') AS ContactFullNameJoined FROM OM_Membership INNER JOIN OM_Contact ON OM_Membership.OriginalContactID=OM_Contact.ContactID WHERE ContactID IN (SELECT * FROM Func_OM_Contact_GetChildren(@ContactID, 1)) AND MemberType=1) as tab WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

DECLARE @list TABLE (ActivityID INT, RN INT); INSERT INTO @list (ActivityID, RN) SELECT ActivityID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##) AS RN FROM ( SELECT OM_Activity.ActivityID, OM_Activity.ActivityTitle, OM_Activity.ActivityType, OM_Activity.ActivityCreated, OM_Activity.ActivitySiteID,OM_Activity.ActivityIPAddress, OM_Contact.ContactID, OM_Contact.ContactMergedWithContactID, ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactLastName, '') AS ContactFullNameJoined FROM OM_Activity INNER JOIN OM_Contact ON OM_Activity.ActivityOriginalContactID = OM_Contact.ContactID WHERE ContactID IN (SELECT * FROM Func_OM_Contact_GetChildren(@ContactID, 1)) ) as tab
WHERE ##WHERE##; DECLARE @num INT; SET @num = (SELECT RN FROM @list WHERE ActivityID = @ActivityID); SELECT ActivityID, RN, @num AS BASE_RN FROM @list WHERE RN IN (@num - 1, @num + 1)

-- ChatMessageLastModified has to be set to SQL Server time because of synchronization across web farms
UPDATE Chat_Message SET [ChatMessageCreatedWhen] = @ChatMessageCreatedWhen, [ChatMessageIPAddress] = @ChatMessageIPAddress, [ChatMessageUserID] = @ChatMessageUserID, [ChatMessageRoomID] = @ChatMessageRoomID, [ChatMessageRejected] = @ChatMessageRejected, [ChatMessageLastModified] = GETDATE(), [ChatMessageText] = @ChatMessageText, [ChatMessageSystemMessageType] = @ChatMessageSystemMessageType, [ChatMessageRecipientID] = @ChatMessageRecipientID WHERE [ChatMessageID] = @ChatMessageID

-- InitiatedChatRequestLastModification has to be set to SQL Server time because of synchronization across web farms
UPDATE Chat_InitiatedChatRequest SET [InitiatedChatRequestUserID] = @InitiatedChatRequestUserID, [InitiatedChatRequestContactID] = @InitiatedChatRequestContactID, [InitiatedChatRequestRoomID] = @InitiatedChatRequestRoomID, [InitiatedChatRequestState] = @InitiatedChatRequestState, [InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorName] = @InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorName, [InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorChatUserID] = @InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorChatUserID, [InitiatedChatRequestLastModification] = GETDATE() WHERE [InitiatedChatRequestID] = @InitiatedChatRequestID

-- CreatedWhen, LastModification and PrivateStateLastModification have to be set to SQL Server time because of synchronization across web farms
INSERT INTO Chat_Room ( [ChatRoomName], [ChatRoomDisplayName], [ChatRoomSiteID], [ChatRoomEnabled], [ChatRoomPrivate], [ChatRoomAllowAnonym], [ChatRoomCreatedWhen], [ChatRoomPassword], [ChatRoomCreatedByChatUserID], [ChatRoomIsSupport], [ChatRoomIsOneToOne], [ChatRoomDescription], [ChatRoomLastModification], [ChatRoomScheduledToDelete], [ChatRoomPrivateStateLastModification], [ChatRoomGUID] ) VALUES ( @ChatRoomName , @ChatRoomDisplayName , @ChatRoomSiteID , @ChatRoomEnabled , @ChatRoomPrivate , @ChatRoomAllowAnonym , GETDATE() , @ChatRoomPassword , @ChatRoomCreatedByChatUserID , @ChatRoomIsSupport , @ChatRoomIsOneToOne , @ChatRoomDescription , GETDATE() , @ChatRoomScheduledToDelete , GETDATE() , @ChatRoomGUID); SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS [ChatRoomID]

-- InitiatedChatRequestLastModification has to be set to SQL Server time because of synchronization across web farms
INSERT INTO Chat_InitiatedChatRequest ( [InitiatedChatRequestUserID], [InitiatedChatRequestContactID], [InitiatedChatRequestRoomID], [InitiatedChatRequestState], [InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorName], [InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorChatUserID], [InitiatedChatRequestLastModification] ) VALUES ( @InitiatedChatRequestUserID , @InitiatedChatRequestContactID , @InitiatedChatRequestRoomID , @InitiatedChatRequestState , @InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorName , @InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorChatUserID , GETDATE() ); SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS [InitiatedChatRequestID]

-- ChatMessageLastModified and ChatMessageCreatedWhen has to be set to SQL Server time because of synchronization across web farms
INSERT INTO Chat_Message ( [ChatMessageCreatedWhen], [ChatMessageIPAddress], [ChatMessageUserID], [ChatMessageRoomID], [ChatMessageRejected], [ChatMessageLastModified], [ChatMessageText], [ChatMessageSystemMessageType], [ChatMessageRecipientID] ) VALUES ( GETDATE() , @ChatMessageIPAddress , @ChatMessageUserID , @ChatMessageRoomID , @ChatMessageRejected , GETDATE() , @ChatMessageText , @ChatMessageSystemMessageType , @ChatMessageRecipientID); SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS [ChatMessageID]

SELECT CR.* FROM Chat_Room AS CR WHERE CR.ChatRoomIsOneToOne = 0 AND (CR.ChatRoomSiteID IS NULL OR CR.ChatRoomSiteID = @SiteID) AND (@ChangedSince IS NULL OR CR.ChatRoomLastModification > @ChangedSince)

--DECLARE @ReceiverID INT --SET @ReceiverID = 83 --DECLARE @SinceWhen DATETIME --SET @SinceWhen = NULL --DECLARE @IsRead BIT --SET @IsRead = NULL
SELECT CN.ChatNotificationID, CN.ChatNotificationType, CN.ChatNotificationSendDateTime, CU.ChatUserNickname AS SenderNickname, CN.ChatNotificationRoomID, CR.ChatRoomDisplayName AS RoomName, CR.ChatRoomIsOneToOne AS IsOneToOne, CN.ChatNotificationIsRead, CN.ChatNotificationReadDateTime FROM Chat_Notification AS CN LEFT JOIN Chat_Room AS CR ON CN.ChatNotificationRoomID = CR.ChatRoomID LEFT JOIN Chat_User AS CU ON CN.ChatNotificationSenderID = CU.ChatUserID WHERE CN.ChatNotificationReceiverID = @ReceiverID -- filter by receiver AND (CN.ChatNotificationSiteID IS NULL OR CN.ChatNotificationSiteID = @SiteID) -- filter by SiteID AND ( (@SinceWhen IS NULL OR @SinceWhen < CN.ChatNotificationSendDateTime) OR (@SinceWhen < CN.ChatNotificationReadDateTime) ) -- filter by time (return only newer notifications) AND (@IsRead IS NULL OR CN.ChatNotificationIsRead = @IsRead) -- filter by IsRead state
SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM CMS_WorkflowHistory WHERE VersionHistoryID IN (SELECT VersionHistoryID FROM CMS_VersionHistory WHERE DocumentID = @DocumentID) AND (##WHERE##) ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
UPDATE Chat_User SET [ChatUserUserID] = @ChatUserUserID, [ChatUserNickname] = @ChatUserNickname, [ChatUserLastModification] = GETDATE() WHERE [ChatUserID] = @ChatUserID

SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM CMS_Role JOIN CMS_MembershipRole ON CMS_MembershipRole.RoleID = CMS_Role.RoleID JOIN CMS_MembershipUser ON CMS_MembershipUser.MembershipID = CMS_MembershipRole.MembershipID WHERE ##WHERE## AND @UserID = CMS_MembershipUser.UserID ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

--DECLARE @ChatRoomID INT --SET @ChatRoomID = 5
SELECT CRU.ChatRoomUserChatUserID AS ChatUserID, CRU.ChatRoomUserKickExpiration AS KickExpiration FROM Chat_RoomUser CRU WHERE CRU.ChatRoomUserRoomID = @ChatRoomID AND CRU.ChatRoomUserKickExpiration IS NOT NULL
Proc_CMS_AutomationState_UpdateObjectID
Proc_Newsletter_Subscriber_UpdateRelatedID

--DECLARE @InactiveForSeconds INT --SET @InactiveForSeconds = 30
UPDATE TR SET ChatSupportTakenRoomLastModification = GETDATE(), ChatSupportTakenRoomChatUserID = NULL FROM Chat_SupportTakenRoom AS TR LEFT JOIN Chat_RoomUser AS RU ON TR.ChatSupportTakenRoomRoomID = RU.ChatRoomUserRoomID AND TR.ChatSupportTakenRoomChatUserID = RU.ChatRoomUserChatUserID LEFT JOIN Chat_OnlineSupport AS OS ON OS.ChatOnlineSupportChatUserID = TR.ChatSupportTakenRoomChatUserID WHERE TR.ChatSupportTakenRoomChatUserID IS NOT NULL AND -- room has to be taken right now DATEADD(SECOND, 5, TR.ChatSupportTakenRoomLastModification) < GETDATE() AND -- Room was taken more than 5 seconds ago (so there was enough time to join room, etc.) ( OS.ChatOnlineSupportID IS NULL OR -- If user is not online on support RU.ChatRoomUserLastChecking IS NULL OR -- Or has left the room DATEADD(SECOND, @InactiveForSeconds, RU.ChatRoomUserLastChecking) < GETDATE() -- Or is inactive in this room for more than @InactiveForSeconds seconds )
SELECT @@ROWCOUNT

UPDATE OM_Contact SET [ContactSalesForceLeadID] = @LeadID, [ContactSalesForceLeadReplicationDisabled] = @LeadReplicationDisabled, [ContactSalesForceLeadReplicationDateTime] = @LeadReplicationDateTime, [ContactSalesForceLeadReplicationSuspensionDateTime] = @LeadReplicationSuspensionDateTime, [ContactSalesForceLeadReplicationRequired] = @LeadReplicationRequired WHERE [ContactID] = @ContactID AND COALESCE([ContactSalesForceLeadReplicationDateTime], '1900-01-01') = @LastLeadReplicationDateTime
UPDATE OM_Contact SET [ContactSalesForceLeadReplicationRequired] = 1 WHERE [ContactID] = @ContactID

SELECT ##COLUMNS## FROM (SELECT MVTestName, MVTestDisplayName, MVTestSiteID, MVTestID, MVTestCulture, MVTestOpenFrom, MVTestOpenTo, MVTestEnabled, MVTestConversions, SUM (HitsValue) AS HitsValue, HitsStartTime,HitsEndTime, MVTestPage, MVTestMaxConversions, MVTestTargetConversionType FROM OM_MVTest LEFT JOIN Analytics_Statistics ON Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsCode LIKE 'mvtconversion;'+ MVTestName+ ';%' AND Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsSiteID = OM_MVTest.MVTestSiteID LEFT JOIN Analytics_YearHits ON Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsID = Analytics_YearHits.HitsStatisticsID GROUP BY MVTestName, MVTestDisplayName, MVTestID, MVTestCulture, MVTestPage, MVTestOpenFrom, MVTestOpenTo, MVTestEnabled, MVTestConversions, MVTestSiteID ,HitsStartTime,HitsEndTime, MVTestMaxConversions, MVTestTargetConversionType ) AS X WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

SELECT ##COLUMNS## FROM (SELECT MVTestName, MVTestDisplayName, MVTestSiteID, MVTestID, MVTestCulture, MVTestPage, MVTestOpenFrom, MVTestOpenTo, MVTestEnabled, SUM(HitsCount) AS MVTestConversions, SUM (HitsValue) AS HitsValue, MVTestMaxConversions, MVTestTargetConversionType FROM OM_MVTest JOIN Analytics_Statistics ON Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsCode LIKE 'mvtconversion;'+ MVTestName+ ';%' AND Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsSiteID = OM_MVTest.MVTestSiteID JOIN Analytics_DayHits ON Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsID = Analytics_DayHits.HitsStatisticsID WHERE HitsStartTime >= @From AND HitsEndTime <= @To GROUP BY MVTestName, MVTestDisplayName, MVTestID, MVTestCulture, MVTestPage, MVTestOpenFrom, MVTestOpenTo, MVTestEnabled, MVTestConversions, MVTestSiteID, MVTestMaxConversions, MVTestTargetConversionType
) AS X WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

) AS X WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

WITH AllData (CategoryID, CategoryDisplayName, CategoryName, CategoryCount, CategoryNamePath, CategoryIDPath, CategoryUserID, CategorySiteID, CategoryParentID) AS ( SELECT CMS_Category.CategoryID, CMS_Category.CategoryDisplayName, CMS_Category.CategoryName, count(DocumentID) as CategoryCount, CMS_Category.CategoryNamePath, CMS_Category.CategoryIDPath, CMS_Category.CategoryUserID, CMS_Category.CategorySiteID, CMS_Category.CategoryParentID FROM CMS_Category INNER JOIN CMS_DocumentCategory ON CMS_Category.CategoryID = CMS_DocumentCategory.CategoryID WHERE DocumentID IN (SELECT DocumentID FROM View_CMS_Tree_Joined WHERE ##WHERE##) GROUP BY CMS_Category.CategoryID, CMS_Category.CategoryDisplayName, CMS_Category.CategoryName, CMS_Category.CategoryNamePath, CMS_Category.CategoryIDPath, CMS_Category.CategoryUserID, CMS_Category.CategorySiteID, CMS_Category.CategoryParentID )
SELECT ##TOPN## CategoryID, CategoryDisplayName, CategoryName, CategoryCount, CategoryNamePath, CategoryIDPath, CategoryUserID, CategorySiteID, CategoryParentID FROM AllData AS cats WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT CategoryID FROM AllData WHERE CategoryParentID = cats.CategoryID) ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

SELECT DISTINCT X.Allowed,X.Denied,X.ValidTo,X.ACLID FROM ( SELECT CMS_ACLItem.Allowed,CMS_ACLItem.Denied, null AS 'ValidTo',CMS_ACL.ACLID FROM CMS_ACL INNER JOIN CMS_ACLItem ON CMS_ACLItem.ACLID = CMS_ACL.ACLID WHERE --User (CMS_ACLItem.UserID IN (SELECT CMS_User.UserID FROM CMS_User JOIN CMS_UserSite ON CMS_User.UserID = CMS_UserSite.UserID WHERE CMS_User.UserID = @UserID AND CMS_UserSite.SiteID = @SiteID ) -- Specific roles OR CMS_ACLItem.RoleID IN (SELECT RoleID FROM CMS_Role WHERE RoleName IN (##GENERICROLES##)) ) -- Membership UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT CMS_ACLItem.Allowed,CMS_ACLItem.Denied, UserRole.ValidTo, CMS_ACL.ACLID FROM CMS_ACL INNER JOIN CMS_ACLItem ON CMS_ACLItem.ACLID = CMS_ACL.ACLID INNER JOIN [View_CMS_UserRoleMembershipRole] AS UserRole ON UserRole.RoleID = CMS_ACLItem.RoleID WHERE (UserRole.ValidTo > @Date OR UserRole.ValidTo IS NULL) AND (UserRole.SiteID = @SiteID OR UserRole.SiteID IS NULL) AND UserRole.UserID = @UserID ) AS X WHERE ##WHERE##

SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM CMS_CssStylesheet, CMS_CssStylesheetSite WHERE CMS_CssStylesheet.StylesheetID = CMS_CssStylesheetSite.StylesheetID AND CMS_CssStylesheetSite.SiteID = @SiteID ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

UPDATE Analytics_Statistics SET StatisticsCode = 'abconversion;'+@NewName + ';' + SUBSTRING(StatisticsCode, CHARINDEX(';',StatisticsCode,14)+1,LEN (StatisticsCode)) WHERE StatisticsCode LIKE 'abconversion;'+ @OldName +';%' AND StatisticsSiteID = @SiteID
UPDATE Analytics_Statistics SET StatisticsCode = 'absessionconversionfirst;'+@NewName + ';' + SUBSTRING(StatisticsCode, CHARINDEX(';',StatisticsCode,26)+1,LEN (StatisticsCode)) WHERE StatisticsCode LIKE 'absessionconversionfirst;'+ @OldName +';%' AND StatisticsSiteID = @SiteID
UPDATE Analytics_Statistics SET StatisticsCode = 'absessionconversionrecurring;'+@NewName + ';' + SUBSTRING(StatisticsCode, CHARINDEX(';',StatisticsCode,30)+1,LEN (StatisticsCode)) WHERE StatisticsCode LIKE 'absessionconversionrecurring;'+ @OldName +';%' AND StatisticsSiteID = @SiteID
UPDATE Analytics_Statistics SET StatisticsCode = 'abvisitfirst;'+@NewName + ';' + SUBSTRING(StatisticsCode, CHARINDEX(';',StatisticsCode,14)+1,LEN (StatisticsCode)) WHERE StatisticsCode LIKE 'abvisitfirst;'+ @OldName +';%' AND StatisticsSiteID = @SiteID
UPDATE Analytics_Statistics SET StatisticsCode = 'abvisitreturn;'+@NewName + ';' + SUBSTRING(StatisticsCode, CHARINDEX(';',StatisticsCode,15)+1,LEN (StatisticsCode)) WHERE StatisticsCode LIKE 'abvisitreturn;'+ @OldName +';%' AND StatisticsSiteID = @SiteID

-- Update statistics names when variant code name changes UPDATE Analytics_Statistics SET StatisticsCode = 'abconversion;' + @ABTestName + ';' + @NewName WHERE StatisticsCode = 'abconversion;' + @ABTestName + ';' + @OldName AND StatisticsSiteID = @SiteID
UPDATE Analytics_Statistics SET StatisticsCode = 'absessionconversionfirst;' + @ABTestName + ';' + @NewName WHERE StatisticsCode = 'absessionconversionfirst;' + @ABTestName + ';' + @OldName AND StatisticsSiteID = @SiteID
UPDATE Analytics_Statistics SET StatisticsCode = 'absessionconversionrecurring;' + @ABTestName + ';' + @NewName WHERE StatisticsCode = 'absessionconversionrecurring;' + @ABTestName + ';' + @OldName AND StatisticsSiteID = @SiteID
UPDATE Analytics_Statistics SET StatisticsCode = 'abvisitfirst;' + @ABTestName + ';' + @NewName WHERE StatisticsCode = 'abvisitfirst;' + @ABTestName + ';' + @OldName AND StatisticsSiteID = @SiteID
UPDATE Analytics_Statistics SET StatisticsCode = 'abvisitreturn;' + @ABTestName + ';' + @NewName WHERE StatisticsCode = 'abvisitreturn;' + @ABTestName + ';' + @OldName AND StatisticsSiteID = @SiteID

UPDATE SM_TwitterAccount SET TwitterAccountIsDefault = 0 WHERE TwitterAccountIsDefault = 1 AND TwitterAccountSiteID = @SiteID

--DECLARE @SiteID INT --SET @SiteID = 4
SELECT CU.*, COU.ChatOnlineUserLastChecking AS LastChecking, COU.ChatOnlineUserIsHidden AS IsHidden, CASE WHEN ChatOnlineUserJoinTime >= ISNULL(ChatOnlineUserLeaveTime, CONVERT(datetime2, '00010101', 112)) AND ChatOnlineUserJoinTime >= ISNULL(ChatUserLastModification, CONVERT(datetime2, '00010101', 112)) THEN ChatOnlineUserJoinTime WHEN ChatOnlineUserLeaveTime >= ISNULL(ChatUserLastModification, CONVERT(datetime2, '00010101', 112)) THEN ChatOnlineUserLeaveTime ELSE ChatUserLastModification END AS LastChange FROM Chat_OnlineUser AS COU LEFT JOIN Chat_User AS CU ON COU.ChatOnlineUserChatUserID = CU.ChatUserID WHERE COU.ChatOnlineUserSiteID = @SiteID AND COU.ChatOnlineUserJoinTime IS NOT NULL ORDER BY LastChange

--DECLARE @SiteID INT --SET @SiteID = 4 --DECLARE @ChangedSince DATETIME --SET @ChangedSince = DATEADD(d, -1, getdate())
SELECT CU.*, COU.ChatOnlineUserLastChecking AS LastChecking, COU.ChatOnlineUserIsHidden AS IsHidden, CASE WHEN ChatOnlineUserJoinTime >= ISNULL(ChatOnlineUserLeaveTime, CONVERT(datetime2, '00010101', 112)) AND ChatOnlineUserJoinTime >= ISNULL(ChatUserLastModification, CONVERT(datetime2, '00010101', 112)) THEN ChatOnlineUserJoinTime WHEN ChatOnlineUserLeaveTime >= ISNULL(ChatUserLastModification, CONVERT(datetime2, '00010101', 112)) THEN ChatOnlineUserLeaveTime ELSE ChatUserLastModification END AS LastChange FROM Chat_OnlineUser AS COU LEFT JOIN Chat_User AS CU ON COU.ChatOnlineUserChatUserID = CU.ChatUserID WHERE COU.ChatOnlineUserSiteID = @SiteID AND (@ChangedSince IS NULL OR COU.ChatOnlineUserJoinTime > @ChangedSince OR COU.ChatOnlineUserLeaveTime > @ChangedSince OR CU.ChatUserLastModification > @ChangedSince ) ORDER BY LastChange

--DECLARE @LastChange DATETIME --SET @LastChange = '2012-06-12 11:37:02.130' -- DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE()) -- '2012-04-25 16:01:35.963' -- NULL --DECLARE @SiteID INT --SET @SiteID = 136; ----SET @LastChange = NULL --DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE())
WITH RoomsWithAllMessages AS ( SELECT Chat_Room.*, Chat_SupportTakenRoom.* , (SELECT MAX(ChatMessageLastModified) FROM Chat_Message WHERE ChatMessageRoomID = ChatRoomID) AS LastMessageModification, (SELECT MAX(ChatMessageLastModified) FROM Chat_Message WHERE ChatMessageRoomID = ChatRoomID AND ChatMessageUserID = ChatSupportTakenRoomChatUserID ) AS LastSupporterMessage FROM Chat_Room LEFT JOIN Chat_SupportTakenRoom ON ChatRoomID = ChatSupportTakenRoomRoomID WHERE ChatRoomIsSupport = 1 AND ChatRoomEnabled = 1 AND (ChatRoomSiteID IS NULL OR ChatRoomSiteID = @SiteID) ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ChatRoomID, ChatRoomDisplayName, COUNT(ChatMessageID) AS UnreadMessagesCount, ChatSupportTakenRoomChatUserID AS TakenByChatUserID, ChatSupportTakenRoomLastModification AS TakenStateLastChange, CASE WHEN ISNULL(ChatSupportTakenRoomLastModification, CONVERT(datetime2, '00010101', 112)) >= ISNULL(LastMessageModification, CONVERT(datetime2, '00010101', 112)) THEN ChatSupportTakenRoomLastModification ELSE LastMessageModification END AS LastChange FROM RoomsWithAllMessages -- CountedMessages - filtered unread messages LEFT JOIN Chat_Message ON ChatMessageRoomID = ChatRoomID AND -- count only non-system messages: ChatMessageSystemMessageType = 0 AND -- count only messages newer than ResolvedDateTime: (ChatSupportTakenRoomResolvedDateTime IS NULL OR ChatSupportTakenRoomResolvedDateTime < ChatMessageLastModified) AND -- if room is taken, count only messages older then taken date time (ChatSupportTakenRoomChatUserID IS NULL OR ChatSupportTakenRoomLastModification < ChatMessageLastModified) AND -- do not count messages older than supporter last message (LastSupporterMessage IS NULL OR LastSupporterMessage < ChatMessageLastModified) GROUP BY ChatRoomID, ChatRoomDisplayName, ChatSupportTakenRoomChatUserID, ChatSupportTakenRoomLastModification, LastMessageModification ) AS T -- if @LastChange is NULL (it is the first request), return rooms with unread messages and taken rooms. Otherwise return changed rooms (new message or taken state changed) WHERE (@LastChange IS NULL AND (UnreadMessagesCount > 0 OR TakenByChatUserID IS NOT NULL)) OR (@LastChange IS NOT NULL AND LastChange > @LastChange)

SELECT ReceiverID, CASE WHEN MaxSend >= COALESCE(MaxRead, CONVERT(datetime2, '00010101', 112)) THEN MaxSend ELSE MaxRead END AS LastNotificationChange FROM ( SELECT CN.ChatNotificationReceiverID AS ReceiverID, MAX(CN.ChatNotificationSendDateTime) AS MaxSend, MAX(ChatNotificationReadDateTime) AS MaxRead FROM Chat_Notification AS CN LEFT JOIN Chat_OnlineUser AS CON ON CN.ChatNotificationReceiverID = CON.ChatOnlineUserID WHERE CON.ChatOnlineUserSiteID = @SiteID AND CON.ChatOnlineUserJoinTime IS NOT NULL AND (CN.ChatNotificationSiteID IS NULL OR CN.ChatNotificationSiteID = @SiteID) -- filter by SiteID GROUP BY CN.ChatNotificationReceiverID ) AS t1

SELECT ##TOPN## Matrix.##COLUMNS##, (CASE WHEN CMS_RolePermission.RoleID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS [Allowed] FROM (SELECT CMS_Permission.PermissionID, CMS_Permission.PermissionOrder, CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayName, CMS_Permission.PermissionName, CMS_Permission.ClassID, CMS_Permission.ClassID AS ResourceID,CMS_Permission.PermissionDescription, CMS_Role.RoleID, CMS_Role.Rolename, CMS_Role.RoleDisplayName FROM CMS_Permission, CMS_Role WHERE (CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayInMatrix = @DisplayInMatrix OR ((@DisplayInMatrix=1) AND (CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayInMatrix IS NULL))) AND ClassID = @ID AND RoleID IN (SELECT RoleID FROM CMS_Role WHERE ##WHERE## AND ((SiteID IS NULL AND @SiteID =0) OR SiteID = @SiteID)) ) Matrix LEFT JOIN CMS_RolePermission ON (Matrix.PermissionID = CMS_RolePermission.PermissionID AND CMS_RolePermission.RoleID = Matrix.RoleID) ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

-- Update support last checking UPDATE Chat_OnlineSupport SET [ChatOnlineSupportLastChecking] = GETDATE() WHERE [ChatOnlineSupportChatUserID] = @ChatUserID AND [ChatOnlineSupportSiteID] = @SiteID;
-- Update all taken rooms last checking UPDATE Chat_RoomUser SET ChatRoomUserLastChecking = GETDATE() FROM Chat_SupportTakenRoom JOIN Chat_Room ON ChatSupportTakenRoomRoomID = ChatRoomID JOIN Chat_RoomUser ON ChatSupportTakenRoomRoomID = ChatRoomUserRoomID WHERE ChatSupportTakenRoomChatUserID = @ChatUserID AND ChatRoomUserChatUserID = @ChatUserID AND ChatSupportTakenRoomResolvedDateTime IS NULL AND ChatRoomSiteID = @SiteID;

SELECT COM_SKUTaxClasses.SKUID, COM_TaxClass.TaxClassID, COM_TaxClass.TaxClassDisplayName, COM_TaxClass.TaxClassZeroIfIDSupplied, COM_TaxClassCountry.TaxValue, CASE WHEN (COM_TaxClass.TaxClassSiteID > 0) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS TaxIsGlobal FROM COM_SKUTaxClasses JOIN COM_TaxClass ON COM_SKUTaxClasses.TaxClassID = COM_TaxClass.TaxClassID JOIN COM_TaxClassCountry ON COM_TaxClassCountry.TaxClassID = COM_TaxClass.TaxClassID WHERE (COM_TaxClassCountry.CountryID = @CountryID) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT COM_TaxClassState.TaxClassID FROM COM_TaxClassState WHERE COM_TaxClassState.StateID = @StateID AND COM_TaxClassState.TaxClassID = COM_TaxClass.TaxClassID AND COM_TaxClassState.TaxValue IS NOT NULL) AND ##WHERE##

SELECT COM_TaxClass.TaxClassZeroIfIDSupplied, COM_TaxClassState.TaxValue, CASE WHEN (COM_TaxClass.TaxClassSiteID > 0) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS TaxIsGlobal FROM COM_SKUTaxClasses JOIN COM_TaxClass ON COM_SKUTaxClasses.TaxClassID = COM_TaxClass.TaxClassID JOIN COM_TaxClassState ON COM_TaxClassState.TaxClassID = COM_TaxClass.TaxClassID WHERE (COM_SKUTaxClasses.SKUID = @SKUID) AND (COM_TaxClassState.StateID = @StateID)

SELECT StringLoadGeneration, StringKey, DefaultText, CultureText, StringIsCustom FROM (SELECT resourceStrings1.StringLoadGeneration, resourceStrings1.StringKey, CAST(defaultLanguage.TranslationText AS nvarchar(4000)) AS DefaultText, CAST(cultureLanguage.TranslationText AS nvarchar(4000)) AS CultureText, resourceStrings1.StringIsCustom FROM CMS_ResourceTranslation AS defaultLanguage INNER JOIN CMS_ResourceString AS resourceStrings1 ON resourceStrings1.StringID = defaultLanguage.TranslationStringID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMS_ResourceTranslation AS cultureLanguage ON defaultLanguage.TranslationStringID = cultureLanguage.TranslationStringID AND (cultureLanguage.TranslationCultureID IS NULL OR cultureLanguage.TranslationCultureID = @Culture) WHERE (defaultLanguage.TranslationCultureID = @DefaultCultureID) UNION SELECT resourceStrings2.StringLoadGeneration, resourceStrings2.StringKey, CAST(defaultLanguage.TranslationText AS nvarchar(4000)) AS DefaultText, CAST(cultureLanguage.TranslationText AS nvarchar(4000)) AS CultureText, resourceStrings2.StringIsCustom FROM CMS_ResourceTranslation AS cultureLanguage INNER JOIN CMS_ResourceString AS resourceStrings2 ON resourceStrings2.StringID = cultureLanguage.TranslationStringID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMS_ResourceTranslation AS defaultLanguage ON defaultLanguage.TranslationStringID = cultureLanguage.TranslationStringID AND defaultLanguage.TranslationCultureID IS NULL WHERE (cultureLanguage.TranslationCultureID = @Culture) AND (NOT EXISTS (SELECT TranslationID, TranslationStringID, TranslationCultureID, CAST(TranslationText AS nvarchar(4000)) AS Expr1 FROM CMS_ResourceTranslation WHERE (TranslationCultureID = @DefaultCultureID) AND (TranslationStringID = cultureLanguage.TranslationStringID))) UNION SELECT StringLoadGeneration, StringKey, NULL AS DefaultText, NULL AS CultureText, StringIsCustom FROM CMS_ResourceString WHERE (StringID NOT IN (SELECT TranslationStringID FROM CMS_ResourceTranslation AS CMS_ResourceTranslation_1 WHERE (TranslationCultureID = @Culture) OR (TranslationCultureID = @DefaultCultureID)))) AS StringInfoRows

SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM (SELECT resourceStrings1.StringKey, resourceStrings1.StringIsCustom, CAST(defaultLanguage.TranslationText AS nvarchar(4000)) AS DefaultText, CAST(cultureLanguage.TranslationText AS nvarchar(4000)) AS CultureText FROM CMS_ResourceTranslation AS defaultLanguage INNER JOIN CMS_ResourceString AS resourceStrings1 ON resourceStrings1.StringID = defaultLanguage.TranslationStringID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMS_ResourceTranslation AS cultureLanguage ON defaultLanguage.TranslationStringID = cultureLanguage.TranslationStringID AND (cultureLanguage.TranslationCultureID IS NULL OR cultureLanguage.TranslationCultureID = @Culture) WHERE (defaultLanguage.TranslationCultureID = @DefaultCultureID) UNION SELECT resourceStrings2.StringKey, resourceStrings2.StringIsCustom, CAST(defaultLanguage.TranslationText AS nvarchar(4000)) AS DefaultText, CAST(cultureLanguage.TranslationText AS nvarchar(4000)) AS CultureText FROM CMS_ResourceTranslation AS cultureLanguage INNER JOIN CMS_ResourceString AS resourceStrings2 ON resourceStrings2.StringID = cultureLanguage.TranslationStringID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMS_ResourceTranslation AS defaultLanguage ON defaultLanguage.TranslationStringID = cultureLanguage.TranslationStringID AND defaultLanguage.TranslationCultureID IS NULL WHERE (cultureLanguage.TranslationCultureID = @Culture) AND (NOT EXISTS (SELECT TranslationID, TranslationStringID, TranslationCultureID, CAST(TranslationText AS nvarchar(4000)) AS Expr1 FROM CMS_ResourceTranslation WHERE (TranslationCultureID = @DefaultCultureID) AND (TranslationStringID = cultureLanguage.TranslationStringID))) UNION SELECT StringKey, StringIsCustom, NULL AS DefaultText, NULL AS CultureText FROM CMS_ResourceString WHERE (StringID NOT IN (SELECT TranslationStringID FROM CMS_ResourceTranslation AS CMS_ResourceTranslation_1 WHERE (TranslationCultureID = @Culture) OR (TranslationCultureID = @DefaultCultureID)))) AS StringInfoRows WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

DECLARE @ClassID int; SET @ClassID = (SELECT TOP 1 ClassID FROM CMS_Class WHERE ClassName = @ClassName); DECLARE @PermissionID int; SET @PermissionID = (SELECT TOP 1 PermissionID FROM CMS_Permission WHERE PermissionName = @PermissionName); DECLARE @UserID int; SET @UserID = (SELECT TOP 1 UserID FROM CMS_User WHERE UserName = @Username); SELECT * FROM CMS_Permission WHERE PermissionID = @PermissionID AND ClassID = @ClassID AND PermissionID IN ( SELECT PermissionID FROM CMS_RolePermission WHERE RoleID IN (SELECT RoleID FROM CMS_UserRole WHERE UserID = @UserID) )

DECLARE @ResourceID int; SET @ResourceID = (SELECT FIRST ResourceID FROM CMS_Resource WHERE ResourceName = @ResourceName); DECLARE @PermissionID int; SET @PermissionID = (SELECT FIRST PermissionID FROM CMS_Permission WHERE PermissionName = @PermissionName); DECLARE @UserID int; SET @UserID = (SELECT FIRST UserID FROM CMS_User WHERE UserName = @UserName); SELECT * FROM CMS_Permission WHERE PermissionID = @PermissionID AND ResourceID = @ResourceID AND PermissionID IN ( SELECT PermissionID FROM CMS_RolePermission WHERE RoleID IN (SELECT RoleID FROM CMS_UserRole WHERE UserID = @UserID) )

SELECT ##TOPN## Matrix.##COLUMNS##, CASE WHEN Forums_ForumRoles.RoleID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS Allowed FROM (SELECT CMS_Permission.PermissionID, CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayName, CMS_Permission.PermissionName, CMS_Permission.PermissionDescription, CMS_Role.RoleID, CMS_Role.Rolename, CMS_Role.RoleDisplayName, CMS_Role.SiteID FROM CMS_Permission, CMS_Role WHERE ResourceID = @ID AND RoleID IN (SELECT RoleID FROM CMS_Role WHERE ##WHERE## AND (SiteID IS NULL OR SiteID = @SiteID OR @SiteID = 0))) Matrix LEFT JOIN Forums_ForumRoles ON (Matrix.PermissionID = Forums_ForumRoles.PermissionID AND Forums_ForumRoles.RoleID = Matrix.RoleID AND Forums_ForumRoles.ForumID = @ForumID) ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

SELECT ##TOPN## * FROM CMS_WorkflowScope WHERE (ScopeSiteID = @ScopeSiteID) AND (ScopeWorkflowID IN (SELECT WorkflowID FROM CMS_Workflow WHERE (WorkflowEnabled = 1) OR (WorkflowEnabled IS NULL))) AND (ScopeClassID = @ScopeClassID OR ScopeClassID IS NULL) AND (ScopeCultureID = @ScopeCultureID OR ScopeCultureID IS NULL) AND ((ScopeStartingPath = '/' OR @NodeAliasPath LIKE ScopeStartingPath + '/%' OR @NodeAliasPath LIKE ScopeStartingPath) AND -- Special case for root (ScopeStartingPath <> '/%' OR @NodeAliasPath <> '/') AND -- Do not select scope with excluded children unless it is the node itself (ScopeExcludeChildren <> 1 OR ScopeExcludeChildren IS NULL OR ScopeStartingPath = @NodeAliasPath)) ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##

IF @type = 'r' SELECT ##TOPN## Matrix.*, (CASE WHEN CMS_RolePermission.RoleID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS [Allowed] FROM (SELECT CMS_Permission.PermissionID, CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayName, CMS_Permission.PermissionName, CMS_Permission.ClassID, CMS_Permission.ResourceID,CMS_Permission.PermissionDescription, CMS_Role.RoleID, CMS_Role.Rolename, CMS_Role.RoleDisplayName FROM CMS_Permission, CMS_Role WHERE (CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayInMatrix = @DisplayInMatrix OR ((@DisplayInMatrix=1) AND (CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayInMatrix IS NULL))) AND ResourceID = @ID AND RoleID IN (SELECT RoleID FROM CMS_Role WHERE ##WHERE## AND (@SiteID = 0 OR SiteID = @SiteID)) ) Matrix LEFT JOIN CMS_RolePermission ON (Matrix.PermissionID = CMS_RolePermission.PermissionID AND CMS_RolePermission.RoleID = Matrix.RoleID) ORDER BY Matrix.RoleDisplayName, Matrix.RoleID, Matrix.PermissionDisplayName ELSE SELECT Matrix.*, 'Allowed' = CASE when CMS_RolePermission.RoleID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM (SELECT CMS_Permission.PermissionID, CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayName, CMS_Permission.PermissionName, CMS_Permission.ClassID, CMS_Permission.ClassID AS ResourceID,CMS_Permission.PermissionDescription, CMS_Role.RoleID, CMS_Role.Rolename, CMS_Role.RoleDisplayName FROM CMS_Permission, CMS_Role WHERE (CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayInMatrix = @DisplayInMatrix OR ((@DisplayInMatrix=1) AND (CMS_Permission.PermissionDisplayInMatrix IS NULL))) AND ClassID = @ID AND RoleID IN (SELECT RoleID FROM CMS_Role WHERE ##WHERE## AND (@SiteID = 0 OR SiteID = @SiteID)) ) Matrix LEFT JOIN CMS_RolePermission ON (Matrix.PermissionID = CMS_RolePermission.PermissionID AND CMS_RolePermission.RoleID = Matrix.RoleID) ORDER BY Matrix.RoleDisplayName, Matrix.RoleID, Matrix.PermissionDisplayName
